Uses of Text in hex
 

Methods in hex that return Text
 Text Hexmovespec.shortMoveText(commonCanvas v)
           
 Text Hexmovespec.shortMoveText(HexGameViewer v)
          shortMoveText lets you return colorized text or mixed text and graphics.
 

Uses of Text in lib
 

Classes in lib that implement Text
 class TextChunk
          class TextChunk is used to prepare strings for drawing colorized colors, with size reduced to fit space available.
 class TextGlyph
          this is an extension to TextChunk which draws Drawable objects instead of text.
